site_name: Development Site At Carrington Street Car Park, 51-53 Brick Street, 100 Piccadilly And 1-6
description: Variation of conditions 1, 13, 21, 22, 33, 34, 44, 45 and 47 of planning permission dated 18 February 2021 (RN:21/04717/FULL) for, 'Demolition of existing buildings on site and redevelopment to provide up to 30 residential units (Class C3), office floorspace (Class E1(g)), gymnasium (Class E(d)), restaurant (Class E(b)) and retail (Class E(a)) floorspace; creation of a new pedestrian link through the site between Yarmouth Place and Carrington Street; erection of buildings either side of the new pedestrian link between 4 and 8 storeys in height, excavation to create additional basement accommodation, provision of on-site car parking, cycle parking and delivery bay on Yarmouth Place, new landscaping including improvement works to Yarmouth Place associated alterations'.; NAMELY, to enable the relocation of the Lower Ground Floor restaurant to Upper Ground Floor, replace the Upper Ground Floor restaurant entrance and lobby with a small retail unit, extending the approved gym in to the area formerly shown for restaurant use and adding a swimming pool, replace the approved art gallery space with office accommodation, undertake minor external updates to the fa√ßade, provision of additional outside space and fixed roof to create a new covered courtyard at Upper Ground Floor level, addition of fireplaces and flues, amendment to cycle storage and amendment to the wording of Conditions.
